description: This file sets up the router configuration for a Vue.js application using vue-router, defining routes for 'home' and 'about' views with lazy-loading for the about route.

methods.name: createRouter
methods.description: Creates a new Vue Router instance with specified history mode and route configurations.

methods.name: createWebHistory
methods.description: Creates an HTML5 history mode for Vue Router to use for navigation.

methods.name: import
methods.description: Dynamically imports Vue components for lazy-loaded routes.
